# Mubyn OS — AI Business Operating System
# https://app.mubyn.com

## What is Mubyn?
Mubyn is an AI-powered business operating system for SMEs in the MENA region. Think "Palantir for SMEs." One dashboard replaces 5-6 SaaS tools with AI agents that actually run your business.

## Core Features
- **Caesar AI (COO)** — Your AI chief operating officer. Bilingual (Arabic/English). Learns your business and manages operations.
- **Lead Generation** — AI discovers potential customers, scores leads, drafts personalized cold emails, sends via your SMTP.
- **CMO Analytics** — Marketing intelligence dashboard. Connects to Shopify, Meta Ads, Google Ads. Content calendar with AI-generated posts and images.
- **CFO Intelligence** — Financial tracking, KPIs, 6-month projections, AI insights, transaction management.
- **Customer Support Agent** — AI-powered CS across 5 channels: website widget, email (IMAP/SMTP), Telegram, WhatsApp Business, live chat. Knowledge base for training.
- **Website Builder** — AI generates complete, professional websites in 60 seconds. Arabic RTL support. Edit with natural language.
- **Integrations** — Shopify, Meta Ads, Google Ads with more coming.

## Target Market
Small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA). Arabic-first, bilingual platform.

## Pricing
Starting at $99/month per business. Free trial available.

## Links
- Landing page: https://mubyn.com
